mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID AS EMPLOYEEID , FIRST_NAME AS FIRSTNAME , LAST_NAME AS LASTNAME , EMAIL , JOB_ID AS JOBID , SALARY , HIRE_DATE AS HIREDATE FROM HR.EMPLOYEES WHERE IF_YN = 'N' AND ROWNUM <= 20 -- ★ 한 번의 Job 실행 때 최대 100개까지만 읽어오기
mapper.update: UPDATE HR.EMPLOYEES SET IF_YN = 'Y' WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #{EMPLOYEEID} -- Reader에서 가져온 별칭 이름과 맞춰야 함
